desc: React template, integrating React Router, Zustand, React I18next, Tailwindcss
about: MONADO The name comes from the game "Altered Excalibur" is one of the weapons used by the protagonist, Excalibur MONADO is said to be given by the gods to **Homes** the holy sword. This is not actually a sword, but a sword-shaped "device" that contains some kind of power, and can change into the form of the blade of light when fighting.
